head.title: Educational Resources (COVID-19) – Students – Towanda Area School District

strong.span: Activity Menus for students in PK-6th Grade

p.span: Students, complete activities from these menus below each day. When school re-opens, bring your completed Menus to the office. Students who have completed at least 10 activities will be entered into a prize drawing.

li.a: TASD Activity Menu PK and K
TASD Enrichment Activities PK and K Week 2
TASD Enrichment Activities PK and K Week 3
TASD Enrichment Activities PK and K Week 4

ul.li:
Achieve3000, Smarty Ants (PK-8)
ELA Resources and Activities
Access through Clever (http://clever.com/in/towanda)

First in Math (1-6)
Online math practice
Access through Clever (http://clever.com/in/towanda)

Towanda School District Digital Library
https://towandapa.libraryreserve.com
Log in with student username and password

Age of Learning programs (ABCmouse (PK-2), Adventure Academy (3-8), Reading IQ (PK-6))
Online games and learning activities
For free access, use the code: SCHOOL6739 at the sites listed below:
ABCmouse www.abcmouse.com/redeem
Adventure Academy www.adventureacademy.com/redeem
Reading IQ www.readingIQ.com/redeem

div.p: To access: Username: JAM132; Password: Knights1
Online courses, instructional videos for all subjects

ul.li:
Lightbox Interactive Textbooks https://sub.openlightbox.com/Lbxaccess/Login?tokenId=4247fb12-a381-4416-bd4f-695376c6eb2e (K-5)
Collections of texts for students, with interactive features - listen or read the text, view videos, websites, pictures, complete activities

div.p: Games to build math skills. Elementary students may already have an account set up with their math teacher.
Collection of lessons. Lessons come with videos, activities
Fun online games to build problem solving. Most are related to STEM, particularly science and math
Collection of games related to civics and government

ul.li:
Music Theory https://www.musictheory.net/exercises
Practice your ability to read music
Don't forget to practice your instruments!

Pennsylvania Museums

Museum of the American Revolution https://www.amrevmuseum.org/education-museum/students-and-teachers/virtual-field-trip
National Toy Train Museum http://www.nttmuseum.org/exhibits/layouts/index.shtml
Betsy Ross House http://historicphiladelphia.org/betsy-ross-house/what-to-see/

Mercer Museum https://www.mercermuseum.org/

Mars https://accessmars.withgoogle.com/
